'''Chick Jr. and Duck Jr.''' are a new chick and duckling that [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] bought [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] as a housewarming gift in the final episode. (Joey named them "Chick Jr." and "Duck Jr." respectively).

In the end, Chandler tells Joey to keep them himself and, again after a few bumps (this time they got stuck in the foosball table), he even considered getting a goose, but Chandler quickly discouraged him, telling him he was "set with the poultry". The birds did not make an appearance on the ''Friends'' spinoff ''[[Joey (TV series)|Joey]]'', and their final fate is unknown (it is possible that they did in fact move in with Chandler and Monica).
